Text: RE Alliant Energy IES Utilities dispute re Poi Cherokee TBS July thru April No Alliant only agreed to pay for the commodity and cashout imbalance invoices for the previous months which they did They sent Northern a letter stating they disputed our collection beyond the month GISB window I had worked with Kathy Washington and Dan Fancler to make sure the would be placed in suspense versus showing up as a receivable on our books I am still working with Dari and Shelly on a letter to be sent to Alliant which addresses the GISB standards and the fact Northern believes they are responsible for the invoices Original Message From Zadow Raetta Sent Monday September PM To Blair Lynn Washington Kathy Fancler Dan Sebesta Chris Cc Zadow Raetta Subject Alliant Energy IES Utilities dispute re Poi Cherokee TBS July thru April Lynn regarding the letters that you asked me to look over I thought that they had agreed to pay these invoices We currently have on IESs accounts receivable an amount of which represents for commodity invoices and for imbalance invoices We have already waived the DDVC invoices of If you have any further questions just let me know Thanks Raetta

RE October Forward Positive Displacement Meter PPA Status Cc I have not sent out the letter to Alliant yet as I need to address this issue Ill need to wait for for your response Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Tue AM To Sebesta Chris Floyd Jodie Cc Semin Frank Subject RE October Forward Positive Displacement Meter PPA Status Chris I only got info on the Mid Am Oct charts I talked to Gary again yesterday and ask for more information Hopefully Ill have something today Have you already sent your letter to Alliant Thanks Lynn Original Message From Sebesta Chris Sent Friday December AM To Blair Lynn Floyd Jodie Cc Semin Frank Subject October Forward Positive Displacement Meter PPA Status Lynn any update yet from Gary or Caroline as to the updates you requested in your December email I am finalizing a letter to Alliant and would like to provide them with an expectation as to the October PPAs Specifically will all the October charts be corrected Further Alliant wants Gas Logistics to tag the PPAs Specifically Alliant requested the differences are identified by gate and amount of change Is this possible Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

Alliant Energy Meeting NotesLynn attached find the notes I took at our meeting with Alliant this week I would like to conduct a conference call with you to go over a few of the items which will require Gas Logistics input Ill call you at today Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

October Forward Positive Displacement Meter PPA Status Cc Lynn any update yet from Gary or Caroline as to the updates you requested in your December email I am finalizing a letter to Alliant and would like to provide them with an expectation as to the October PPAs Specifically will all the October charts be corrected Further Alliant wants Gas Logistics to tag the PPAs Specifically Alliant requested the differences are identified by gate and amount of change Is this possible Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

Measurement Detail Cc A conference call has been scheduled for Thursday December at PM to review the measurement data Alliant would like to have access to electronically and the data Northern can provide I will initiate the call Please let me know if your schedules change Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

Accounts Receivables Cc The attached list are outstanding receivables associated with the Central Region group that have occurred prior to December These are in addition to the receivables Frank Semin sent to you on December Total value of these receivables are Please have these receivables written off prior to January Thanks Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

RE AlliantWPL WriteOff Spreadsheet and Request Agreement Cc Jean as part of an April meeting Alliant expressed concern as to why they had just received a accounts receivable package dating back to Bill Cordes promised Northern would look into the receivables and Market Services was to work with WPL to clear Before Marketing would consider approving a writeoff please furnish an update of Gas Logistics discussions with WPL and either the progress towards paymentresolution or WPLs position Thank you Original Message From Blair Jean Sent Tuesday October PM To Sebesta Chris Cc Zadow Raetta Perry Renee Subject AlliantWPL WriteOff Spreadsheet and Request Agreement Chris Per out conversation a few weeks ago Im attaching WPLs Spreadsheet showing ALL Contracts DDVC and Imbalance invoices outstanding File WPLARJBRBxls As you will note this is the same spreadsheet that accompanied the packet to WPL no data has changed Its been sometime but perhaps you might have archived the packet that I forwarded to you at that time it did include the invoices as well as the spreadsheet Also see the last page of the Spreadsheet which gives you a breakout total for each category ContractsDDVC and Imbalance for writeoff Also attached is the Writeoff Agreement Form with a brief explanation and the required approval signatures Perhaps the explanation is not the appropriate verbage I certainly do welcome you editing if this does not meet with your approval File WPLWRITEOFFSEBESTAdoc WPLs Current Business is clean if this historical business is approved for writeoff we will then have a complete clean slate with WPL Chris I wished I had a better option however as soon as you have had an opportunity to review and digest the attached informaton Ill be happy to discuss at your earliest convenience if we need further clarification of the spreadsheet or the approval form Best regards Jean L Blair Houston Enron Gas Logistics Northern Natural Gas Company North Team

Customer Service Cc Jerry I want to take this opportunity and thank you for the high level of customer service you provided to AlliantWPL today I received an email from Kelly Schneider this morning letting me know how much they appreciated your help By alerting them that their final cycle noms were off by one MMBtu they were able to fix their noms to prevent the whole batch being invalidated Thank you again Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax
Follow Up to December Meeting Cc email Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

FW Follow Up Meeting Cc It was agreed at our December meeting to meet again by March The following are dates when Alliant is free Please let me know which dates work in your schedule and I will coordinate a follow up meeting Thanks Chris Original Message From Kelly Schneider mailto Sent Thursday January PM To Sebesta Chris Subject Re Follow Up Meeting Chris The following dates and times work for us Monday February th after pm Tuesday February th anytime in the afternoon Wednesday February th anytime in the afternoon Monday February th after pm Tuesday February th anytime in the afternoon Let us know what works for NNG so we can get it on our calendars It would be nice if Shelly Corman could attend Thanks Kelly Kelly Schneider Gas Trader Alliant Energy PH FAX
